medium: Reproduction (?) of pen and ink drawing
title: Untitled [silhouette of girl with small bouquet looking at bird in tree]
description: silhouette of girl holding a small bouquet of flowers at right, looking up at a bird with two very long tail feathers and six tall feathers on head perched in a small tree; white flowers in foreground at bottom; linear images of trees in background; mounted to brown paper; probably a reproduction
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
